text: 17:16 Jeremaia 50:41-42; Esekiel 16:37; Akar Mogomem 18:8; 18:16Asɨzir atiam ko 10plan komɨn nɨ ganizir kabanang, arazir kurabagh amir amizimɨn apanim damuam. Me an biziba bar da inigh, egh an korotiaba bar da suegh, an mɨkarzimɨn tuziba bar dar amegh, egh avimɨn a daboroghtɨma a bar moghɨra isigham.
